title: Kylie Jenner's hosts extravagant pre-Halloween celebrations for one-year-old Stormi
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner has hosted an extravagant pre-Halloween party for her one-year-old baby Stormi.

The 22-year-old billionaire ensured her tot had the swankiest party around as Halloween began early in the Jenner household.

Kylie posted photos from the occasion to her Instagram account.

In the first snap, she cradles Stormi on her lap as they sit together in a haystack.

They are surrounded by festive pumpkins, with Stormi even wearing an adorable outfit with little pumpkins all over it.

In another picture, Stormi looks just like her mum at she sits amongst the pumpkins with trendy white trainers on.

Kylie also posted videos of her daughter running around the pumpkin patch and shared a photo of the cookies they baked together.

(Image: Instagram)

The mum of one recently split from Stormi's father, Travis Scott, following rumours he cheated on her with Instagram model YungSweetRo.

It is believed that the pair had been trying to make the relationship work for a while, but it was decided a few weeks ago that they should go their separate ways.

Since then Kylie was linked to her boyfriend before Travis, rapper Tyga.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Kylie was pictured heading to a recording studio where Travis was at before attending the same nightclub as him days later.

"The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is," she wrote. “There was no ‘2 a.m. date with Tyga.’ You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.”

She went on: "Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! Our friendship and our daughter is priority."
description:
The billionaire ensured her tot had the hottest party around as Halloween
began early in the Jenner household
